About Nick

Product builder, forever curious partner

I bridge strategy, design, and execution to help teams validate faster and deliver products that earn trust. SandRise is how I embed with founders and product teams to go from idea to impact.

Work with SandRise Open resume
Story

A product practice shaped by building and scaling

From early-stage scrappy teams to scaled product orgs, I’ve seen what helps teams find clarity—and what holds them back. SandRise is a studio built to bring the best of those lessons to every engagement.

2024

Founded SandRise

Created SandRise to partner with venture-backed and mission-led teams as a fractional product leader.

2021

Head of Product, Atlas Labs

Scaled product org and launched analytics suite that increased retention 18%.

2018

Product Lead, Northwind

Shipped B2B marketplace from prototype to Series B, introducing a unified design system.

Values

What guides every partnership

A few principles that shape how SandRise shows up in the work.

Build signal before scale

Every roadmap starts with clarity. I map assumptions, run crisp experiments, and translate findings into confident bets.

Design for trust

Inclusive, accessible experiences are non-negotiable. I craft journeys that feel effortless, credible, and human.

Ship momentum, not tickets

Momentum compounds. I partner closely with teams to keep decisions transparent, outcomes measured, and releases meaningful.

How we’ll collaborate

  • Embedded partnerships I plug into your team, co-own outcomes, and leave behind clear playbooks so momentum sticks.
  • Transparent rhythms We set cadence, define decision loops, and ensure every sprint ladder ups to your goals.
  • Measurable impact Inputs and outcomes are visible from day one—no black boxes, just honest progress.
